pkgmetadata.longdescription: The command line file manager. More information about the use flags can be found here: https://github.com/leo-arch/clifm/blob/master/src/README.md#compiling-features-inout

use.flag: Support for Bleach, the built-in file names cleaner
Enable icons and set them to use the noto-emoji font (see media-fonts/noto-emoji)
Enable icons and set them to use icons-in-terminal (see https://github.com/sebastiencs/icons-in-terminal)
Add Lira as the default built-in resource opener
Enable icons and set them to use NerdFonts
